About Ken

Politics

Politics are easily my primary passion. SYRIZA's storm to victory in Greece's January, 2015 elections kept me euphoric for a week.

Art

After politics, art is my true love. It is bitter sweet, though. My problem is that I'm not an artist. The best I can do is take semi-decent photographs of city-scapes and moments in daily life. Never the less, I appreciate art. Especially art for the people: street murals.

Bikes

I've been cycling since 2004. It started out of a practical need.The bike pictured here isn't mine, but it has a close resemblance. Mine is more colorful.

Travel

I haven't been able to travel as much as I'd like. But I've lived in Berkeley and San Francisco, CA. I've visited Mexico, Costa Rica, Guatemala, and India. I just recently visited Ecuador for two weeks.

Please note: none of the images above were produced by me. All were taken from Google Image. However, if you'd be interested in seeing some of my photography, please feel free to visit flickr and instagram.
